headline: Charles Schwab Aligns New Leadership With Higher Dividend And Growth Focus
summary: Charles Schwab (NYSE:SCHW) announced a 19% increase in its regular quarterly dividend. The company is restructuring leadership, with senior executive retirements and new reporting lines across wealth, banking, technology, operations, and data. Neesha Hathi will oversee combined wealth and banking operations, while Dennis Howard will lead a new technology, operations, and data organization. These moves reflect an executive succession plan and Board support for Schwab's current direction. For...
